sentences.en: But you know, if I find out that you have given Mike so much as a breath mint, trust me, there is not enough novocaine in this office to numb the pain I will inflict on you.
sentences.cn: 但是你知道，如果我发现你给迈克作为薄荷糖这么多，相信我，没有在这麻木的痛苦我会在你的办公室造成足够的奴佛卡因。

sentences.en: I'm going to give you some novocaine. Do your lips and tongue feel numb now?
sentences.cn: 我给你打一针普鲁卡因. 你的嘴和舌头麻了 吗 ?

sentences.en: The dentist deadened the nerve with Novocaine.
sentences.cn: 牙医用奴佛卡因麻醉神经.

trans.tran_cn: <药>奴佛卡因（一种麻醉药的商品名）
